name: Keeping It Alive
description:
WE RECOMMEND TO PLAY THE GAME IN FULLSCREEN!!

Jose María is alone, walking on a rainy day. A surprise in the sewers changes his life for the next 7 days. Take the trolley, get the kids and never left them behind you!

“Keeping It Alive” is a creepy procedural scroller. Take the kids, avoid the obstacles and never forget the trolley. You have 7 days.

Unlock all the ends!

Visit us on Twitter, our Web or Instagram
